phrases: If I were to borrow Tendo's words...
I am starting to get into it.
There is something wrong with his hand.
There will be no victory without risks, either.
Karasuno is only Karasuno when we are persistently attacking!
Karasuno High School vs Shiratorizawa Academy
That is why you have got to have someone follow up with a block.
Having everyone attack is way too reckless!
Did that just decide this match?
We will do that again next time.
Always keep the block timing in your head.
Since you lack height, that will be much more important for you.
If you feel like it is going to be even a little late,
switch over to a soft block.
How many points in a row did they get with Ushiwaka serving there?
More than a third what they need to win.
But Hinata's coming back out now.
It is first tempo with anyone.
We are just two points behind!
You sure got hit in a strange place.
My hands could not go up in time, so I thought about receiving it with my face,
but I did not want it to hit my nose, so...
So you moved your face because you could actually see it?
Well, if I got a nosebleed, I would have to go back onto the bench.
When I heard about Karasuno's first-year duo,
and when he stole my ball at the school,
That he was like the other small yet talented players I have met.
I could not feel the same talented techniques or intelligence in him.
I have not doubted once that we would win.
that I want to crush you.
The taste of blood in my mouth...
I wonder if Shoyo's in pain after all.
But having someone to follow up and block is reassuring.
Earlier, he followed up like that because there was
no getting around Asahi hitting it, but...
Usually, their style is anyone who can attack, will attack.
They do not think their attack being stopped.
They trust that it will not.
So as soon as their attack is stopped, they are pretty much out.
Though we did get yelled at about following up with a block quite a bit.
If I were the coach, I would do the same thing.
I cannot help but hope that someone follows up.
Narrowing the paths for angle shots...
And Daichi's in the path for a straight.
I am going to take my chance with that straight!
If we go for what is somewhat safe here,
it will mean we never changed!
They are going to do it again!
Judging by his form, it will not be a back toss.
I have not seen him do any combos with their 10.
So it will probably got to the guy with the facial hair in the back...
We will do that again next time.
When I am in this kind of thought process, I have already lost.
Is there a toss going up for me?
I am not going to think about that.
I am going to hit it.
By attacking with that in mind, our opponents' blocks become confused.
It is obvious when you see their faces.
I cannot believe Sugawara was able
to fearlessly charge like that again, right after he was shut down!
I am sure he is scared,
but I guess it is more important to have an even stronger will to attack.
Stick your hands up, damn it!
I do not care if your prediction ends up wrong!
I put you in there knowing damn well that might be a possibility!
Watch out for the back of your head.
He just got back and he was able to serve like that?
The first touch turned right into a set?
I-I did not really see it, but everything's so fast!
Now I really do not know who is going to win!
I thought that our usual quick would have been enough of a surprise attack,
but this time he came at me on purpose.
You guys are not being loud enough!
Now they are in double digits...
Try to stop him at one!
Hey, why is not Semi-san our main setter?
He is way better than Shirabu-san, to be honest.
It all depends on what you consider to be better.
I think Shirabu-san's pretty reliable, so I like him.
I know what makes me inferior to Shirabu.
The need to show just how strong I am.
Even though I know Shiratorizawa's setter does not need that right now,
I have to find the right words to say to them...
This is exactly when we should be cheering!
We are going to finish this.
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
The City of Trees, Sendai, lies below
And when you look up, the magnificent Sendai Castle
Fire it up, fire it up, Karasuno!
Our school, our glorious Shiratorizawa Academy
But he is that far from the net...
I told him to do a soft block,
but that was more of an insanely close receive than a quick block.
I would be too scared of that hitting my face to ever do that!
Now Karasuno's at double digits, too!
Karasuno High School vs Shiratorizawa Academy
Karasuno High School vs Shiratorizawa Academy
Now Karasuno's at double digits, too!
Do not get so worked up over a lucky shot!
That is a block that got in the way of a receive.
YOU-Ushijima-san, you just got stopped by a nameless first-year.
Guess you have still got a ways to go.
Ushijima-san is a great ace that is always marked.
Of course, he is going to be stopped sometimes.
But to think that tiny first-year did it...
He actually had the instinct to jump back at that moment...
Narita-san, come in whenever you would like.
There is not a single thing for you to be scared about.
I will be aiming straight down diagonally to the other side, right at Ushiwaka,
but there is no point if the serve is soft.
I do not think that is all.
If we keep hitting them hard,
they are going to start pushing back.
Despite all these barriers, it is still not enough to stop him?
You are using a quick when you just matched up
Why would you have any reason to panic with all of your talent?
We are going to stop it this time.
He does not dress up his words, nor do they have any other meaning.
No more words are needed from the great ace to the other ace.
They just scored three points in a row!
They might just make it all the way!
They got that precisely through that incomplete block.
I am sure he wanted to make up for his last serve receive.
But you are going to be switching immediately with Nishinoya-san.
Is not that 8 supposed to be the impulsive type?!
Tsutomu is our only first-year that is in the starting lineup.
Not to mention Glasses is not here, either.
I wonder how they are going to survive this match point.
You actually made the guy who just received the ball hit it again?
They should be running out of stamina any time now,
and they are all still able to run like that...
I have no choice but to admit that it is an effective attack.
I will not lose to anyone in receiving,
and I can jump really well, so I am confident in my attacks, too!
Now you just have to get a bit taller...
I am so small, I cannot even fight?
I am going to lose to someone just because they are tall?
No one here is just big.
I envy them, and they annoy me,
Do I want a way to fight, even though I am small?
If they do not break, Karasuno's going to continue to be in danger.
Their stamina and concentration's could run out at any moment.
No matter what it takes, just get the ball up from Shiratorizawa's powerful cannon
There has to be a limit to aiming for the damn net!
They made our setter get it!
If we get the timing wrong, it is all over.
Do I want a way to fight, even though I am small?
I want a simple strength that can make anything surrender.
But it is taking everything they have just to return the ball.
A rally where both sides are low stamina and fighting for control of the game...
Do not let your energy run out, and do not stop hitting the ball.
We have to get it, no matter what!
But we do not have any more timeouts...
Do not you dare look down!
is a sport where you are always looking up!
I do not usually climb stairs two at a time, so...
Now that Yacchan's back, it is finally time for the counterattack!
Next time on Haikyu!! : The Volleyball Idiots.
